europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: F. Herman, Stefan Smidt: Ecosystem Studies in a Limestone Area - Achenkirch Altitude Profiles. Introduction and Objetives. 9- 22. M. Breitenbach-Dorfner: Genetic Analysis of Spruce Stands in the Limestone Alps - a Pilot Study. 23- 31. M. Englisch, Franz Starlinger: Woodland Communities and Sites at Two Altitude Profiles Near Achenkirch (The Tyrol). 33- 54. F. Mutsch: Classification of the Soil in the Area of Achenkirch According to Chemical Parameters. 55- 64. Ursula Peintner, M. Moser: The Mycobiota (Basidiomycetes) of an Alpine Tyrolean Valley. 65- 81. A. Rangger, H. Insam: Microbial Activities and Biomass Along an Altitudinal Profile in the Northern Tyrolean Limestone Alps. 83- 94. Friederike Göbl, S. Thurner: Evaluation of Forest Sites by Means of Condition Assessment of Mycorrhizae and Fine Roots. 95- 107. N. Kreuzinger, R. Podeu, Friederike Göbl, F Gruber, C. P. Kubicek: Identification of Some Ectomycorrhizal Basidiomycetes by PCR-Amplification of their gpd (Glycerinaldehyde-3-phosphate Dehydrogenase Encoding) Genes. 109- 118. A. Ottitsch: Land Use Potential Analysis Achenkirch. 119- 130. T. W. Berger, K. Katzensteiner: Deposition of Atmospheric Pollutants and its Impact on Forest Ecosystems of Northern Tyrolean Limestone Alps. 131- 144. F. Mutsch: The Use of Heavy Metals Detected in the Soil as Air-Pollution Indicatrs on a Stemming Slope of the Achenkirch Area. 145- 154. Ursula Peintner, M. Moser: Survey of Heavy Metal Deposition at the Schulterberg (Achenkirch Altitude Profiles) by Using Basidiomycetes as Bioindicators. 155- 162. Maria Müller, E. Bermadinger-Stabentheiner: Investigations of Chromosomal Aberrations in the Root Tip Meristems of Spruce Trees from the "Achenkirch Altitude Profiles". 163- 175. Monika Sobotik, Ch. Poppelbaum: Vegetational and Root-Ecological Investigations on Forest Pasturing and Pure Pasturing Areas of the Northern Tyrolean Limestone Alps. 177- 192. Friederike Göbl: Investigations on Mycorrhizae and Fine Roots in an Area used as Forest Pasture. 193- 204. H. Insam, A. Rangger, M. Henrich, W. Hitzl: Investigations on Mycorrhizae and Fine Roots in an Area used as Forest Pasture. 205- 216. K. Schadauer: The Effect of Grazing on Soil Microbial Biomass and Community on Alpine Pastures. 217- 230. K Stefan, F. Herman: Nutrient Contents of Spruce Needles from the Tyrolean Limestone Alps. 231- 244. Stefan Smidt, F. Mutsch, M. H. Knoflacher, K Stefan, F. Herman: Stress on the Northern Tyrolean Limestone Alps by the Deposition of Pollutants. 245- 270. Stefan Smidt, F. Herman: Description of the Northern Tyrolean Limestone Alps and Assessment of Risk - Synopsis. 271- 294. Anonymus: Publications concerning investigations within the region Achenkirch. 295- 302
